structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Report of trustees to city legislative body.
law.text: The board of trustees of the policemen's and firefighters' pension fund shall make a report in writing, signed by the president and secretary of said board, to the legislative body of said city, of the condition of said pension fund, on the first meeting in September of the legislative body of said city in each and every year.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 43, effective June 17, 1978. --Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 9, sec. 22.
